price: और यदि वह व्यक्ति झुठलाने वाले गुमराहों में से है,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
